header.title: E.S.P.N. GmbH
header.description: ESPN  GmbH  is  an  experienced  personnel  leasing  company  with  a  broad  international   background  in  personnel  placement.  We  have  recently  also  been  operating  in  Vienna  and   offer  our  services  directly  on  site.  Our  commitment  and  expertise  enable  us  to  respond  specifically   to  the  needs  of  our  customers  and  to  place  qualified  personnel  precisely  in  line  with  their  needs.

services.title: Services
services.description: We ideate, implement, and transform digital landscapes to help your business stay modern, efficient, and agile.

about.title: About Us
about.description: The company has strong experience in the bakery and retail sectors, offering tailored personnel solutions to meet industry-specific demands. The collaboration with bakery businesses has helped improve operational efficiency and customer satisfaction for their partners.
